---
title: "Gapminder Data Analysis"
format: html
---

The dataset that is used for this quiz is gapminder.csv and it contains 6 columns and 1,704 rows. The columns are: country, continent, year, life_expectancy, population_millions, and gdp_per_capita. The dataset contains information about these variables in 142 countries over the years 1952 to 2007, with a 5-year interval.
